text: Colette Maze (16 June 1914 - 19 November 2023) was a French pianist. She played classical music. Maze was born in Paris, France. == Life == Maze studied at the Ã‰cole Normale de Musique de Paris with Alfred Cortot and Nadia Boulanger. She was a piano teacher. In 2017, Maze released her fourth album dedicated to Claude Debussy. It also has works by Federico Mompou, Astor Piazzolla, and Alberto Ginastera. Maze died on 19 November 2023 in Paris at the age of 109. ==Discography== * * * * * * == References == Category:French pianists Category:1914 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Musicians from Paris Category:French centenarians
title: Colette Maze
